membership:
SAZKA Group a.s. is not affiliated to any organization. 
  
Some of SAZKA Group a.s. companies are members of “The European Lotteries” (EL) and the “World Lotteries Association” (WLA).
goals__remit: SAZKA Group a.s. is one of the largest consumer gaming holding companies in Europe. Its business is focused on lottery and sports betting. SAZKA Group a.s. is the sole owner of the Czech lottery company SAZKA and has significant shareholdings in the Greek lottery OPAP, LOTTOITALIA, Casinos Austria and Austrian Lotteries and SuperSport (Croatia). SAZKA Group a.s. strives to bring innovation to the lottery and gaming industry; the vision is to continue expanding whilst adhering to responsible gaming principles, in particular by providing customers with entertainment and life-changing opportunities in a responsible, professional and efficient manner, while having a positive impact on the societies in which it operates.  Responsibility is one of the key differentiators of how the SAZKA Group a.s. operates lotteries and other gaming activities compared to other forms of competition, illegal competition in particular.  Being clearly committed to responsible gaming principles, corporate responsibility is at the heart of the group’s activities.
relevant_communication:
SAZKA Group a. s. is committed to a transparent and constructive dialogue with EU stakeholders, namely officials of the EU Institutions (European Commission, European Parliament, Council of the European Union), members of the European Parliament, representatives at the European Economic and Social Committee and Committee of the Regions as well as business stakeholders and civil society. 
We generally follow the implementation of European and national legislation on gaming and online betting; sports policies and initiatives to combat the manipulation of sports competitions; CSR, sponsorship, culture, consumer protection policies, prevention of money laundering, licensing, intellectual property rights, taxation, innovation, digital economy, international trade, EC ‘better regulation policy’.
legal_status: a.s. (joint-stock company incorporated under the laws of the Czech Republic).
